roleset.name: to attack suddenly
roleset.note: POUNCE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'pounce' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from pounce.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Here was [*T*-1] [the state security apparatus]-1 poised [*]-1 to pounce on any words or acts of provocation , let alone revolution .
example.arg: on any words or acts of provocation , let alone revolution
